title: Student Consultant in "Adaptability in Hospital"
content:
<!--StartFragment-->

**Jan 2019 - Jun 2019 ETH Zurich, Balser & Hofmann**

**\>>>** Worked under supervision of B.H. Managing Director, David Grossmann and Arch’lab Architects’ founder, Cheng Teng Choy **\>>>** Researched and provided solutions to hospital adaptability, prototyped with 6+ posters focusing on various perspectives and a 40-page brochure receiving high recognition
